desc_cn_template: 若自身命元≤{otherParams[0]}，每轮多加{otherParams[1]}次换牌机会。
desc_en_template: If your Destiny ≤ {otherParams[0]}, add {otherParams[1]} more Exchange Card Chances per round.
desc_tw_template: 若自身命元≤{otherParams[0]}，每輪多加{otherParams[1]}次換牌機會。
desc_cn: 若自身命元≤50，每轮多加2次换牌机会。
desc_en: If your Destiny ≤ 50, add 2 more Exchange Card Chances per round.

desc_cn_template:
战斗开始时，视作已用过{otherParams[0]}次“云剑”。
到达化神期后：修为减{otherParams[1]}，随机获得{otherParams[1]}张“云剑”。
desc_en_template:
At the beginning of the battle, it is considered that the 'Cloud Sword' has been used {otherParams[0]} times.
After reaching the Incarnation Phase: Lose {otherParams[1]} Cultivation and obtain {otherParams[1]} "Cloud Sword".
desc_tw_template:
戰鬥開始時，視作已用過{otherParams[0]}次“雲劍”。
到達化神期後：修爲减{otherParams[1]}，隨機獲得{otherParams[1]}張“雲劍”。
desc_cn:
战斗开始时，视作已用过2次“云剑”。
到达化神期后：修为减3，随机获得3张“云剑”。
desc_en:
At the beginning of the battle, it is considered that the 'Cloud Sword' has been used 2 times.
After reaching the Incarnation Phase: Lose 3 Cultivation and obtain 3 "Cloud Sword".

desc_cn_template: 第{effectRound}轮起生效：自身回合若未攻击则加{otherParams[0]}【KEYWORD_剑意】。
desc_en_template: Effective from round {effectRound}: If you do not attack during your turn, gain {otherParams[0]} 【KEYWORD_剑意】 at the end of turn.
desc_tw_template: 第{effectRound}輪起生效：自身回合若未攻擊則加{otherParams[0]}【KEYWORD_剑意】。
desc_cn: 第8轮起生效：自身回合若未攻击则加1[剑意]。
desc_en: Effective from round 8: If you do not attack during your turn, gain 1 [Sword Intent] at the end of turn.

desc_cn_template: 到达化神期且{effectRound}轮后：修为减1，获得1张【2】。
desc_en_template: After reaching the Incarnation Phase and round {effectRound}: Lose 1 Cultivation and gain 1 【2】.
desc_tw_template: 到達化神期且{effectRound}輪後：修爲减1，獲得1張【2】。
desc_cn: 到达化神期且11轮后：修为减1，获得1张[狂剑•炎舞]。
desc_en: After reaching the Incarnation Phase and round 11: Lose 1 Cultivation and gain 1 [Unrestrained Sword - Flame Dance].

desc_cn_template:
每次攻击时减对方{otherParams[0]}生命上限。
第{effectRound}轮起生效：每场战斗首次使用有攻的牌后，追加{otherParams[1]}攻，若此攻击消耗【KEYWORD_剑意】，返还最多{otherParams[2]}【KEYWORD_剑意】。
desc_en_template:
Each of your attack reduces {otherParams[0]} Max HP of your opponent.
Effective from round {effectRound}: After the first play of a card with ATK in each battle, make an additional {otherParams[1]} ATK, and if this ATK affected by 【KEYWORD_剑意】, a maximum of {otherParams[2]} 【KEYWORD_剑意】 will be returned.
desc_tw_template:
每次攻擊時减對方{otherParams[0]}生命上限。
第{effectRound}輪起生效：每場戰鬥首次使用有攻的牌後，追加{otherParams[1]}攻，若此攻擊消耗【KEYWORD_剑意】，返還最多{otherParams[2]}【KEYWORD_剑意】。
desc_cn:
每次攻击时减对方2生命上限。
第8轮起生效：每场战斗首次使用有攻的牌后，追加6攻，若此攻击消耗[剑意]，返还最多5[剑意]。
desc_en:
Each of your attack reduces 2 Max HP of your opponent.
Effective from round 8: After the first play of a card with ATK in each battle, make an additional 6 ATK, and if this ATK affected by [Sword Intent], a maximum of 5 [Sword Intent] will be returned.

desc_cn_template:
回合开始时若防≤{otherParams[0]}则不会自然减半。
第{effectRound}轮起生效：每次攻击后，自身下回合加{otherParams[1]}防。
desc_en_template:
If your DEF ≤ {otherParams[0]} at the beginning of your turn, it will not naturally halve.
Effective from round {effectRound}: After each attack, add {otherParams[1]} DEF in the next round.
desc_tw_template:
回合開始時若防≤{otherParams[0]}則不會自然减半。
第{effectRound}輪起生效：每次攻擊後，自身下回合加{otherParams[1]}防。
desc_cn:
回合开始时若防≤10则不会自然减半。
第11轮起生效：每次攻击后，自身下回合加1防。
desc_en:
If your DEF ≤ 10 at the beginning of your turn, it will not naturally halve.
Effective from round 11: After each attack, add 1 DEF in the next round.

desc_cn_template:
自身【KEYWORD_无视防御】的攻击多{otherParams[0]}攻。
第{effectRound}轮起生效：每当触发【KEYWORD_再次行动】后，自身下1次攻击【KEYWORD_无视防御】。
desc_en_template:
Your attack with 【KEYWORD_无视防御】 add {otherParams[0]} ATK.
Effective from round {effectRound}: Whenever you trigger 【KEYWORD_再次行动】, your next attack will 【KEYWORD_无视防御】.
desc_tw_template:
自身【KEYWORD_无视防御】的攻擊多{otherParams[0]}攻。
第{effectRound}輪起生效：每當觸發【KEYWORD_再次行动】後，自身下1次攻擊【KEYWORD_无视防御】。
desc_cn:
自身[无视防御]的攻击多1攻。
第13轮起生效：每当触发[再次行动]后，自身下1次攻击[无视防御]。
desc_en:
Your attack with [Ignore DEF] add 1 ATK.
Effective from round 13: Whenever you trigger [Chase], your next attack will [Ignore DEF].

desc_cn_template: 若自身命元≤{otherParams[0]}，战斗开始时加{otherParams[1]}防。
desc_en_template: If your Destiny ≤ {otherParams[0]}, add {otherParams[1]} DEF at the beginning of the battle.
desc_tw_template: 若自身命元≤{otherParams[0]}，戰鬥開始時加{otherParams[1]}防。
desc_cn: 若自身命元≤50，战斗开始时加30防。
desc_en: If your Destiny ≤ 50, add 30 DEF at the beginning of the battle.

desc_cn_template: 第{effectRound}轮起生效：战斗开始时，升级卡组中前{otherParams[0]}张基础【KEYWORD_灵气】消耗为1的牌，战斗结束还原。
desc_en_template: Effective from round {effectRound}: Upgrade your first 2 cards with 1 Qi cost in battle, and revert it after the battle.
desc_tw_template: 第{effectRound}輪起生效：戰鬥開始時，升級卡組中前{otherParams[0]}張基礎【KEYWORD_灵气】消耗爲1的牌，戰鬥結束還原。
desc_cn: 第14轮起生效：战斗开始时，升级卡组中前2张基础[灵气]消耗为1的牌，战斗结束还原。
desc_en: Effective from round 14: Upgrade your first 2 cards with 1 Qi cost in battle, and revert it after the battle.

desc_cn_template:
使用“灵剑”后不会中断连续使用“云剑”计数，且下一张牌的【KEYWORD_连云】效果也可被触发。
到达元婴期后：修为减{otherParams[0]}，随机获得{otherParams[0]}张“灵剑”（金丹期以上）。
到达化神期后：修为减{otherParams[0]}，随机获得{otherParams[0]}张“灵剑”（元婴期以上）。
desc_en_template:
After play a "Spirit Sword", successive count of "Cloud Sword" played will not be reset, and the 【KEYWORD_连云】 effect of the next card can be triggered.
After reaching the Immortality Phase: Lose {otherParams[0]} Cultivation and obtain {otherParams[0]} "Spirit Sword" (above Virtuoso Phase).
After reaching the Incarnation Phase: Lose {otherParams[0]} Cultivation and obtain {otherParams[0]} "Spirit Sword" (above Immortality Phase).
desc_tw_template:
使用“靈劍”後不會中斷連續使用“雲劍”計數，且下一張牌的【KEYWORD_连云】效果也可被觸發。
到達元嬰期後：修爲减{otherParams[0]}，隨機獲得{otherParams[0]}張“靈劍”（金丹期以上）。
到達化神期後：修爲减{otherParams[0]}，隨機獲得{otherParams[0]}張“靈劍”（元嬰期以上）。
desc_cn:
使用“灵剑”后不会中断连续使用“云剑”计数，且下一张牌的[连云]效果也可被触发。
到达元婴期后：修为减3，随机获得3张“灵剑”（金丹期以上）。
到达化神期后：修为减3，随机获得3张“灵剑”（元婴期以上）。
desc_en:
After play a "Spirit Sword", successive count of "Cloud Sword" played will not be reset, and the [Cloud Hit] effect of the next card can be triggered.
After reaching the Immortality Phase: Lose 3 Cultivation and obtain 3 "Spirit Sword" (above Virtuoso Phase).
After reaching the Incarnation Phase: Lose 3 Cultivation and obtain 3 "Spirit Sword" (above Immortality Phase).

desc_cn_template:
使用名字含“猫”的牌击伤对方后施加{otherParams[0]}层【KEYWORD_外伤】（每回合限1次）。
第{effectRound}轮起生效：改为{otherParams[1]}层【KEYWORD_外伤】。
desc_en_template:
After play a card with the name "cat" to injure the opponent, apply {otherParams[0]} 【KEYWORD_外伤】 (limited to 1 time per turn).
Effective from round {effectRound}: Change to apply {otherParams[1]} 【KEYWORD_外伤】.
desc_tw_template:
使用名字含“猫”的牌擊傷對方後施加{otherParams[0]}層【KEYWORD_外伤】（每回合限1次）。
第{effectRound}輪起生效：改爲{otherParams[1]}層【KEYWORD_外傷】。
desc_cn:
使用名字含“猫”的牌击伤对方后施加1层[外伤]（每回合限1次）。
第14轮起生效：改为2层[外伤]。
desc_en:
After play a card with the name "cat" to injure the opponent, apply 1 [Wound] (limited to 1 time per turn).
Effective from round 14: Change to apply 2 [Wound].

desc_cn_template: 第{effectRound}轮起生效：每次战斗失败后，【TALENT_129】增加1次触发机会。
desc_en_template: Effective from round {effectRound}: After each battle failure, 【TALENT_129】 increases one chance to trigger.
desc_tw_template: 第{effectRound}輪起生效：每次戰鬥失敗後，【TALENT_129】增加1次觸發機會。
desc_cn: 第3轮起生效：每次战斗失败后，[好奇心]增加1次触发机会。
desc_en: Effective from round 3: After each battle failure, [Curiosity] increases one chance to trigger.

desc_cn_template: 第{effectRound}轮起生效：【TALENT_92】改为让【19】每轮加{otherParams[0]}攻，且取消次数上限。
desc_en_template: Effective from round {effectRound}: 【TALENT_92】 allow the 【19】 to increase 2 ATK per round, and there is no longer an upper limit.
desc_tw_template: 第{effectRound}輪起生效：【TALENT_92】改爲讓【19】每輪加{otherParams[0]}攻，且取消次數上限。
desc_cn: 第9轮起生效：[铸剑师]改为让[澄心剑胚]每轮加2攻，且取消次数上限。
desc_en: Effective from round 9: [Swordsmith] allow the [Clear Heart Sword Embryo] to increase 2 ATK per round, and there is no longer an upper limit.

desc_cn_template: 第{effectRound}轮起生效：使用【19】后追加{otherParams[0]}攻。
desc_en_template: Effective from round {effectRound}: After play 【19】, make an additional {otherParams[0]} ATK.
desc_tw_template: 第{effectRound}輪起生效：使用【19】後追加{otherParams[0]}攻。
desc_cn: 第13轮起生效：使用[澄心剑胚]后追加5攻。
desc_en: Effective from round 13: After play [Clear Heart Sword Embryo], make an additional 5 ATK.

desc_cn_template:
第7轮起生效：使用【19】时先加{otherParams[0]}【KEYWORD_灵气】。
第16轮起生效：改为加{otherParams[1]}【KEYWORD_灵气】。
desc_en_template:
Effective from round 7: When playing【19】, add {otherParams[0]} 【KEYWORD_灵气】.
Effective from round 16: Change to add {otherParams[1]} 【KEYWORD_灵气】.
desc_tw_template:
第7輪起生效：使用【19】時先加{otherParams[0]}【KEYWORD_灵气】。
第16輪起生效：改爲加{otherParams[1]}【KEYWORD_灵气】。
desc_cn:
第7轮起生效：使用[澄心剑胚]时先加1[灵气]。
第16轮起生效：改为加2[灵气]。
desc_en:
Effective from round 7: When playing[Clear Heart Sword Embryo], add 1 [Qi].
Effective from round 16: Change to add 2 [Qi].

desc_cn_template: 遗忘【TALENT_189】中的金丹期牌（若自身已到金丹期，每遗忘1张减1修为），重新领悟境界更高的“剑”牌。
desc_en_template: Forget the Virtuoso Phase card in 【TALENT_189】 (if you have reached the Virtuoso Phase, you lose 1 Cultivation for each forgot card), and re-comprehend the "Sword" card with a higher Phase.
desc_tw_template: 遺忘【TALENT_189】中的金丹期牌（若自身已到金丹期，每遺忘1張减1修爲），重新領悟境界更高的“劍”牌。
desc_cn: 遗忘[悟剑天赋]中的金丹期牌（若自身已到金丹期，每遗忘1张减1修为），重新领悟境界更高的“剑”牌。
desc_en: Forget the Virtuoso Phase card in [Swordplay Talent] (if you have reached the Virtuoso Phase, you lose 1 Cultivation for each forgot card), and re-comprehend the "Sword" card with a higher Phase.

desc_cn_template:
到达筑基期后：修为减4，随机获得“云剑”“狂剑”“灵剑”“剑阵”牌各一张。
到达化神期后：以上效果再生效一次。
desc_en_template:
After reaching the Foundation Phase: Lose 4 Cultivation and you can obtain a card each of "Cloud Sword", "Unrestrained Sword", "Spirit Sword" and "Sword Formation".
After reaching the Incarnation Phase: The above effect will be triggered again.
desc_tw_template:
到達築基期後：修爲减4，隨機獲得“雲劍”“狂劍”“靈劍”“劍陣”牌各一張。
到達化神期後：以上效果再生效一次。
desc_cn:
到达筑基期后：修为减4，随机获得“云剑”“狂剑”“灵剑”“剑阵”牌各一张。
到达化神期后：以上效果再生效一次。
desc_en:
After reaching the Foundation Phase: Lose 4 Cultivation and you can obtain a card each of "Cloud Sword", "Unrestrained Sword", "Spirit Sword" and "Sword Formation".
After reaching the Incarnation Phase: The above effect will be triggered again.

desc_cn_template: 第{effectRound}轮起生效：使用“剑阵”牌时加1【KEYWORD_灵气】（每回合限1次）。
desc_en_template: Effective from round {effectRound}: When playing "Sword Formation" card, add 1 【KEYWORD_灵气】 (limited to 1 time per turn).
desc_tw_template: 第{effectRound}輪起生效：使用“劍陣”牌時加1【KEYWORD_灵气】（每回合限1次）。
desc_cn: 第6轮起生效：使用“剑阵”牌时加1[灵气]（每回合限1次）。
desc_en: Effective from round 6: When playing "Sword Formation" card, add 1 [Qi] (limited to 1 time per turn).

desc_cn_template: 合成卡牌时也会增加【TALENT_29】1次计数。
desc_en_template: When synthesizing cards, the 【TALENT_29】 count will also be increased by 1.
desc_tw_template: 合成卡牌時也會增加【TALENT_29】1次計數。
desc_cn: 合成卡牌时也会增加[勤学苦练]1次计数。
desc_en: When synthesizing cards, the [Study Hard] count will also be increased by 1.

desc_cn_template:
战斗开始时生命上限+{otherParams[0]}。
第{effectRound}轮起生效：每次加防时多加{otherParams[1]}点。
desc_en_template:
At the beginning of the battle, Max HP + {otherParams[0]}.
Effective from round {effectRound}: Add {otherParams[1]} extra point each time you add DEF.
desc_tw_template:
戰鬥開始時生命上限+{otherParams[0]}。
第{effectRound}輪起生效：每次加防時多加{otherParams[1]}點。
desc_cn:
战斗开始时生命上限+20。
第15轮起生效：每次加防时多加1点。
desc_en:
At the beginning of the battle, Max HP + 20.
Effective from round 15: Add 1 extra point each time you add DEF.

desc_cn_template: 若自身命元≤{otherParams[0]}，战斗开始时升级卡组中前{otherParams[1]}张筑基期牌，战斗结束还原。
desc_en_template: If your Destiny ≤ {otherParams[0]}, upgrade your first {otherParams[1]} Foundation Phase cards in battle, and revert it after the battle.
desc_tw_template: 若自身命元≤{otherParams[0]}，戰鬥開始時升級卡組中前{otherParams[1]}張築基期牌，戰鬥結束還原。
desc_cn: 若自身命元≤20，战斗开始时升级卡组中前2张筑基期牌，战斗结束还原。
desc_en: If your Destiny ≤ 20, upgrade your first 2 Foundation Phase cards in battle, and revert it after the battle.

desc_cn_template: 第{effectRound}轮起生效：使用【5】时向对方施加1层【KEYWORD_内伤】和1层【KEYWORD_困缚】。
desc_en_template: Effective from round {effectRound}: When playing 【5】, apply 1 【KEYWORD_内伤】 and 1 【KEYWORD_困缚】 to your opponent.
desc_tw_template: 第{effectRound}輪起生效：使用【5】時向對方施加1層【KEYWORD_内伤】和1層【KEYWORD_困缚】。
desc_cn: 第11轮起生效：使用[瓮中捉鳖]时向对方施加1层[内伤]和1层[困缚]。
desc_en: Effective from round 11: When playing [Within Reach], apply 1 [Internal Injury] and 1 [Entangled] to your opponent.

desc_cn_template: 每轮开始时，自身减{otherParams[0]}命元（最低减至30），【TALENT_114】加{otherParams[1]}计数。
desc_en_template: At the beginning of each round, you lose {otherParams[0]} Destiny (minimum to 30), and the count of 【TALENT_114】 will be increased by {otherParams[1]}.
desc_tw_template: 每輪開始時，自身减{otherParams[0]}命元（最低减至30），【TALENT_114】加{otherParams[1]}計數。
desc_cn: 每轮开始时，自身减1命元（最低减至30），[血脉威能]加8计数。
desc_en: At the beginning of each round, you lose 1 Destiny (minimum to 30), and the count of [Bloodline Power] will be increased by 8.

desc_cn_template:
战斗开始时，升级卡组中第1张名字含“雷”的牌，战斗结束还原。
第{effectRound}轮起生效：“第1张”改为“前2张”。
desc_en_template:
Upgrade your first card with "Thunder"  in its name in battle, and revert it after the battle.
Effective from round {effectRound}: Changes "first card" to "first 2 cards".
desc_tw_template:
戰鬥開始時，升級卡組中第1張名字含“雷”的牌，戰鬥結束還原。
第{effectRound}輪起生效：“第1張”改爲“前2張”。
desc_cn:
战斗开始时，升级卡组中第1张名字含“雷”的牌，战斗结束还原。
第13轮起生效：“第1张”改为“前2张”。
desc_en:
Upgrade your first card with "Thunder"  in its name in battle, and revert it after the battle.
Effective from round 13: Changes "first card" to "first 2 cards".

desc_cn_template: 第{effectRound}轮起生效：每次对方获得【KEYWORD_内伤】时多加1层。
desc_en_template: Effective from round {effectRound}: Each time your opponent gain 【KEYWORD_内伤】, an additional stack is added.
desc_tw_template: 第{effectRound}輪起生效：每次對方獲得【KEYWORD_内伤】時多加1層。
desc_cn: 第12轮起生效：每次对方获得[内伤]时多加1层。
desc_en: Effective from round 12: Each time your opponent gain [Internal Injury], an additional stack is added.

desc_cn_template: 第{effectRound}轮起生效：战斗开始时，升级卡组中第一张名字含“卦”且不超过元婴期的牌，战斗结束还原。
desc_en_template: Effective from round {effectRound}: Upgrade your first "Hexagram" card (does not exceed the Immortality Phase) in battle, and revert it after the battle.
desc_tw_template: 第{effectRound}輪起生效：戰鬥開始時，升級卡組中第一張名字含“卦”且不超過元嬰期的牌，戰鬥結束還原。
desc_cn: 第4轮起生效：战斗开始时，升级卡组中第一张名字含“卦”且不超过元婴期的牌，战斗结束还原。
desc_en: Effective from round 4: Upgrade your first "Hexagram" card (does not exceed the Immortality Phase) in battle, and revert it after the battle.

desc_cn_template:
命元+{otherParams[0]}。
选择此共鸣后的下1次战斗若自身失败，受到的命元伤害变为0。
desc_en_template:
Destiny + {otherParams[0]}.
If you fail in the next battle after selecting this resonance, the Destiny damage you take will become 0.
desc_tw_template:
命元+{otherParams[0]}。
選擇此共鳴後的下1次戰鬥若自身失敗，受到的命元傷害變爲0。
desc_cn:
命元+20。
选择此共鸣后的下1次战斗若自身失败，受到的命元伤害变为0。
desc_en:
Destiny + 20.

desc_cn_template: 每当奇数轮开始时多加4换牌机会、2生命上限和2修为（奇数轮时选择此共鸣也会立刻触发1次）；每当偶数轮开始时少加3换牌机会、2生命上限和2修为。

If selected at or before the Immortality Phase: After reaching the Immortality Phase, obtain 1 【48】.
If selected during the Incarnation Phase and before round {effectRound} begins: Obtain 1 【50】.
If selected during the Incarnation Phase and after round {effectRound} begins: Lose 4 Cul. and obtain 1 【79】.

If selected at or before the Immortality Phase: After reaching the Immortality Phase, obtain 1 [Azure Dragon Sword Formation].
If selected during the Incarnation Phase and before round 17 begins: Obtain 1 [Dragon Devours Clouds].
If selected during the Incarnation Phase and after round 17 begins: Lose 4 Cul. and obtain 1 [Loong].

desc_cn: 第9轮起生效：使用[云剑•唤雨]后，自身所有牌都视作“云剑”，直到战斗结束。

desc_cn_template: 每轮首次触发仙命【TALENT_129】时，获得的牌升至2级。

desc_en: The first time you trigger the Immortal Fate [Curiosity] each round, the card obtained is upgraded to level 2.

desc_cn_template:
根据仙命【TALENT_93】的选择，附加额外效果：
锐利：使用【19】攻击时，不受【KEYWORD_虚弱】和【KEYWORD_减攻】效果影响。
稳固：使用【19】时获得1层[水月剑阵]效果（自身下1回合开始时【KEYWORD_防】不减半）。
desc_en_template:
Based on the selection of Immortal Fate 【TALENT_93】, additional effects are attached:
Sharpness: When using 【19】 to attack, it is not affected by 【KEYWORD_虚弱】 and 【KEYWORD_减攻】 effects.
Stable: When playing 【19】, gain 1 stack of [Moon Water Sword Formation] effect (your DEF will not be halved at the beginning of the next turn).
desc_tw_template:
根據仙命【TALENT_93】的選擇，附加額外效果：
銳利：使用【19】攻擊時，不受【KEYWORD_虛弱】和【KEYWORD_减攻】效果影響。
穩固：使用【19】時獲得1層[水月劍陣]效果（自身下1回合開始時【KEYWORD_防】不减半）。
desc_cn:
根据仙命[剑锋锻造]的选择，附加额外效果：
锐利：使用[澄心剑胚]攻击时，不受[虚弱]和[减攻]效果影响。
稳固：使用[澄心剑胚]时获得1层[水月剑阵]效果（自身下1回合开始时[防]不减半）。
desc_en:
Based on the selection of Immortal Fate [Blade Forging], additional effects are attached:
Sharpness: When using [Clear Heart Sword Embryo] to attack, it is not affected by [Weakened] and [Decrease ATK] effects.
Stable: When playing [Clear Heart Sword Embryo], gain 1 stack of [Moon Water Sword Formation] effect (your DEF will not be halved at the beginning of the next turn).

desc_cn_template: 触发仙命【TALENT_189】时所获得牌升至2级，若为【KEYWORD_持续】牌则升至3级。
desc_en_template: When triggering Immortal Fate 【TALENT_189】, the card obtained are upgraded to level 2. If it is a 【KEYWORD_持续】 card, it is upgraded to level 3.
desc_tw_template: 觸發仙命【TALENT_189】時所獲得牌升至2級，若爲【KEYWORD_持續】牌則升至3級。

desc_en: When triggering Immortal Fate [Swordplay Talent], the card obtained are upgraded to level 2. If it is a [Continuous] card, it is upgraded to level 3.

desc_cn_template:
战斗中和对方修为(加上【KEYWORD_速度】)相同时，自身优先行动。
第{effectRound}轮起生效：【KEYWORD_速度】+{otherParams[0]}。

During battle, if your Cultivation (plus 【KEYWORD_速度】) is equal to your opponent's, you get priority action.
Effective from round {effectRound}: 【KEYWORD_速度】 +{otherParams[0]}.
desc_tw_template:
戰鬥中和對方修爲(加上【KEYWORD_速度】)相同時，自身優先行動。
第{effectRound}輪起生效：【KEYWORD_速度】+{otherParams[0]}。
desc_cn:
战斗中和对方修为(加上[速度])相同时，自身优先行动。
第8轮起生效：[速度]+3。
desc_en:
During battle, if your Cultivation (plus [Speed]) is equal to your opponent's, you get priority action.
Effective from round 8: [Speed] +3.

desc_cn_template: 仙命【TALENT_29】在第4次和第6次触发抽牌时，抽到的牌变为【12】。
desc_en_template: On the 4th and 6th trigger Immortal Fate 【TALENT_29】 for drawing cards, the drawn card becomes 【12】.

desc_en: On the 4th and 6th trigger Immortal Fate [Study Hard] for drawing cards, the drawn card becomes [Only Traces].

desc_cn_template: 选择仙命【TALENT_42】后：删除手牌和卡组中最多{otherParams[0]}张炼气期牌，获得等量的元婴期或以上的随机牌（有概率出现2级牌或秘术牌）；若删除了不足{otherParams[0]}张牌，则每不足1张就减1修为抽1张牌。
desc_en_template: After selecting Immortal Fate 【TALENT_42】: Remove up to {otherParams[0]} Meditation Phase cards from your hand and deck, and obtain an equal number of random Immortality Phase or higher cards (there is a chance to draw Level 2 cards or Secret Enchantment cards). If fewer than {otherParams[0]} cards are removed, lose 1 Cultivation and draw 1 card for each card short.
desc_tw_template: 選擇仙命【TALENT_42】後：删除手牌和卡組中最多{otherParams[0]}張煉氣期牌，獲得等量的元嬰期或以上的隨機牌（有概率出現2級牌或秘術牌）；若删除了不足{otherParams[0]}張牌，則每不足1張就减1修爲抽1張牌。
desc_cn: 选择仙命[斩断俗尘]后：删除手牌和卡组中最多4张炼气期牌，获得等量的元婴期或以上的随机牌（有概率出现2级牌或秘术牌）；若删除了不足4张牌，则每不足1张就减1修为抽1张牌。
desc_en: After selecting Immortal Fate [Cut Off Mundane]: Remove up to 4 Meditation Phase cards from your hand and deck, and obtain an equal number of random Immortality Phase or higher cards (there is a chance to draw Level 2 cards or Secret Enchantment cards). If fewer than 4 cards are removed, lose 1 Cultivation and draw 1 card for each card short.

desc_cn_template:
根据仙命【TALENT_114】已触发抽牌次数，附加1种效果：
0～2次：每次战斗胜利时，【TALENT_114】计数额外加{otherParams[0]}。
3～4次：每场战斗开始时获得1【KEYWORD_加攻】。
5次及以上：每场战斗开始时获得2【KEYWORD_加攻】。

Based on the number of times Immortal Fate 【TALENT_114】 has triggered for drawing cards, attach one of the following effects:
0 to 2 times: Each time you win a battle, the count of 【TALENT_114】 increases by an additional {otherParams[0]}.
3 to 4 times: Gain 1 【KEYWORD_加攻】 at the start of each battle.
5 times or more: Gain 2 【KEYWORD_加攻】 at the start of each battle.
desc_tw_template:
根據仙命【TALENT_114】已觸發抽牌次數，附加1種效果：
0～2次：每次戰鬥勝利時，【TALENT_114】計數額外加{otherParams[0]}。
3～4次：每場戰鬥開始時獲得1【KEYWORD_加攻】。
5次及以上：每場戰鬥開始時獲得2【KEYWORD_加攻】。
desc_cn:
根据仙命[血脉威能]已触发抽牌次数，附加1种效果：
0～2次：每次战斗胜利时，[血脉威能]计数额外加4。

5次及以上：每场战斗开始时获得2[加攻]。
desc_en:
Based on the number of times Immortal Fate [Bloodline Power] has triggered for drawing cards, attach one of the following effects:
0 to 2 times: Each time you win a battle, the count of [Bloodline Power] increases by an additional 4.
3 to 4 times: Gain 1 [Increase ATK] at the start of each battle.
5 times or more: Gain 2 [Increase ATK] at the start of each battle.

desc_en: Effective from round 6: After playing a card with "Palm" in its name, make an additional 3 ATK.

desc_cn_template:
若卡组中的【KEYWORD_持续】牌仅有【74】，其描述中“最多加X”的限制取消。
第{effectRound}轮起生效：战斗开始时，升级卡组中前{otherParams[0]}张“崩拳”，战斗结束还原。
desc_en_template:
If the only 【KEYWORD_持续】 card in your deck is 【74】, remove the "up to X" limit from its description.
Effective from round {effectRound}: At the start of battle, upgrade the first {otherParams[0]} "Crushing Fist" cards in your deck, revert them after the battle.
desc_tw_template:
若卡組中的【KEYWORD_持續】牌僅有【74】，其描述中“最多加X”的限制取消。
第{effectRound}輪起生效：戰鬥開始時，升級卡組中前{otherParams[0]}張“崩拳”，戰鬥結束還原。
desc_cn:
若卡组中的[持续]牌仅有[崩拳·冥夜]，其描述中“最多加X”的限制取消。
第12轮起生效：战斗开始时，升级卡组中前2张“崩拳”，战斗结束还原。
desc_en:
If the only [Continuous] card in your deck is [Crash Fist - Styx Night], remove the "up to X" limit from its description.
Effective from round 12: At the start of battle, upgrade the first 2 "Crushing Fist" cards in your deck, revert them after the battle.

desc_cn_template:
若卡组中含至少1张【0】，则战斗失败时也可触发【TALENT_183】。
第{effectRound}轮起生效：【TALENT_183】描述中“最多加4次”的限制取消，且每次触发【TALENT_183】加体魄上限时多加1点。
desc_en_template:
If your deck contains at least 1 【0】, then even if you lose the battle, you can still trigger 【TALENT_183】.
Effective from round {effectRound}: Remove the "up to 4 times" limit from  【TALENT_183】,  and an additional 1 [Physique] Cap is added for each trigger.
desc_tw_template:
若卡組中含至少1張【0】，則戰鬥失敗時也可觸發【TALENT_183】。
第{effectRound}輪起生效：【TALENT_183】描述中“最多加4次”的限制取消，且每次觸發【TALENT_183】加體魄上限時多加1點。
desc_cn:
若卡组中含至少1张[普通攻击]，则战斗失败时也可触发[禅心锻身]。
第9轮起生效：[禅心锻身]描述中“最多加4次”的限制取消，且每次触发[禅心锻身]加体魄上限时多加1点。
desc_en:
If your deck contains at least 1 [Normal Attack], then even if you lose the battle, you can still trigger [Zen Mind Forging Body].
Effective from round 9: Remove the "up to 4 times" limit from  [Zen Mind Forging Body],  and an additional 1 [Physique] Cap is added for each trigger.

desc_cn_template: 第{effectRound}轮起生效：使用【81】后，双方在自身回合开始时触发的每层【KEYWORD_恢复】/【KEYWORD_内伤】效果从加/减1生命改为2生命。
desc_en_template: Effective from round {effectRound}: After playing 【81】, each stack of 【KEYWORD_恢复】/【KEYWORD_内伤】 effect triggered at the start of both player's turn changes from add/lose 1 HP to 2 HP.
desc_tw_template: 第{effectRound}輪起生效：使用【81】後，雙方在自身回合開始時觸發的每層【KEYWORD_恢復】/【KEYWORD_內傷】效果從加/减1生命改爲2生命。
desc_cn: 第10轮起生效：使用[冥心入玄]后，双方在自身回合开始时触发的每层[恢复]/[内伤]效果从加/减1生命改为2生命。
desc_en: Effective from round 10: After playing [Meditation of Xuan], each stack of [Regeneration]/[Internal Injury] effect triggered at the start of both player's turn changes from add/lose 1 HP to 2 HP.

desc_cn_template:
第{effectRound}轮起，仙命【TALENT_206】附加额外效果：
【KEYWORD_拳】：受到的【KEYWORD_破绽】效果降低20%。自身回合开始时触发【KEYWORD_内伤】而减的生命降低50%。
【KEYWORD_棍】：受到的【KEYWORD_虚弱】效果降低20%。自身的【KEYWORD_再次行动】即将被【KEYWORD_困缚】阻止时，改为减自身15生命而不被阻止。
desc_en_template:
Effective from round {effectRound}: Immortal Fate 【TALENT_206】 adds additional effects:
【KEYWORD_拳】: Reduce the effect of 【KEYWORD_破绽】 by 20%. At the start of your turn, reduce the HP lost due to 【KEYWORD_内伤】 by 50%.
【KEYWORD_棍】: Reduce the effect of 【KEYWORD_虚弱】 by 20%. When your 【KEYWORD_再次行动】 is about to be prevented by 【KEYWORD_困缚】, instead, reduce your HP by 15 without being prevented.
desc_tw_template:
第{effectRound}輪起，仙命【TALENT_206】附加額外效果：
【KEYWORD_拳】：受到的【KEYWORD_破綻】效果降低20%。自身回合開始時觸發【KEYWORD_內傷】而减的生命降低50%。
【KEYWORD_棍】：受到的【KEYWORD_虛弱】效果降低20%。自身的【KEYWORD_再次行動】即將被【KEYWORD_困縛】阻止時，改爲减自身15生命而不被阻止。
desc_cn:
第6轮起，仙命[志坚]附加额外效果：
[拳]：受到的[破绽]效果降低20%。自身回合开始时触发[内伤]而减的生命降低50%。
[棍]：受到的[虚弱]效果降低20%。自身的[再次行动]即将被[困缚]阻止时，改为减自身15生命而不被阻止。
desc_en:
Effective from round 6: Immortal Fate [Indomitable Will] adds additional effects:
[Fist]: Reduce the effect of [Flaw] by 20%. At the start of your turn, reduce the HP lost due to [Internal Injury] by 50%.
[Stick]: Reduce the effect of [Weakened] by 20%. When your [Chase] is about to be prevented by [Entangled], instead, reduce your HP by 15 without being prevented.

desc_cn_template:
解除【TALENT_204】无法获得灵气和修为的限制（不再改加体魄），加回因【TALENT_204】而少加的修为。
第{effectRound}轮起生效：每场战斗结束时若自身【KEYWORD_灵气】≥{otherParams[0]}，加1修为。
desc_en_template:
Remove the restriction from Immortal Fate 【TALENT_204】 that prevents you from gaining 【KEYWORD_灵气】 and Cultivation (no longer adds Physique), and restore the Cultivation that was missed due to 【TALENT_204】.
Effective from round {effectRound}: At the end of each battle, if your 【KEYWORD_灵气】 ≥ {otherParams[0]}, gain 1 Cultivation.
desc_tw_template:
解除【TALENT_204】無法獲得靈氣和修爲的限制（不再改加體魄），加回因【TALENT_204】而少加的修爲。
第{effectRound}輪起生效：每場戰鬥結束時若自身【KEYWORD_靈氣】≥{otherParams[0]}，加1修爲。
desc_cn:
解除[凡躯]无法获得灵气和修为的限制（不再改加体魄），加回因[凡躯]而少加的修为。
第9轮起生效：每场战斗结束时若自身[灵气]≥4，加1修为。
desc_en:
Remove the restriction from Immortal Fate [Mortal Body] that prevents you from gaining [Qi] and Cultivation (no longer adds Physique), and restore the Cultivation that was missed due to [Mortal Body].
Effective from round 9: At the end of each battle, if your [Qi] ≥ 4, gain 1 Cultivation.
